name: M365 Roadmap Agent
description: This agent helps you search and summarize Microsoft 365 Roadmap items using natural language. Works with the M365 Roadmap OData API to provide Microsoft 365 Roadmap information.

conversation_starters.title: Search for Microsoft 365 Copilot Updates
conversation_starters.text: Show recent roadmap items regarding Copilot published in the last two weeks

conversation_starters.title: Search by description
conversation_starters.text: Show roadmap items with 'security' in the description published in the last month

conversation_starters.title: Find Roadmap Items for Specific Cloud Instances
conversation_starters.text: Show roadmap items available for GCC High and DoD cloud instances with General Availability in the next month.

conversation_starters.title: Find Recent 'In Development' Roadmap Items
conversation_starters.text: Show the top 10 recent Copilot roadmap items in development created in the last 30 days.

conversation_starters.title: Explore Copilot agent and Purview Roadmap Items
conversation_starters.text: Are there any roadmap items that mention agent in the description are shipping in the next 90 days and mention Purview or Copilot in the product field?

conversation_starters.title: Show Troubleshooting Info
conversation_starters.text: Show me troubleshooting information including API details and version
